email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 is acceptable. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan as 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Can you confirm this? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can confirm the laycan as 15-18 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Once reviewed, we can proceed with the fixture. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the charter party agreement looks good. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $51.00 per metric ton and a demurrage rate of $20,000 per day. Please confirm the final details, and we’ll issue the LOI. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The fixture is finalized at $51.00 per metric ton, with a laycan of 15-18 October and a demurrage rate of $20,000 per day. I’ll await the LOI. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
